channel.title: Persistence on Cheesy Rumbles
channel.description: Recent content in Persistence on Cheesy Rumbles

item.title: Persistence: 1
item.description:
Sagi- (the father of the /dev/random series) and superkojiman (the mastermind behind the brainpan series) have teamed up to create a new vulnerable virtual machine! The content of the creation was filled with a mixture of what they have seen in their day jobs, and dreaming up evil and cunning ideas. The end result is a mischievous challenge, which was crying out to headline VulnHub’s next competition.

I submitted my write-up for the competition on September 20 in PDF format. Because it’s especially long (I think it was the longest write-up submitted, sorry judges), I’m not going to convert it into a blog post.

Instead, the original PDF can be downloaded here (~700KB).
